text: Martí Vergés Massa, usually known as "Martín Vergés", (8 March 1934 – 17 February 2021) was a Spanish footballer. He played for FC Barcelona from 1956 to 1966. He made twelve appearances for the Spain national football team from 1957 to 1962. He was included in their 1962 FIFA World Cup squad. Vergés died on 17 February 2021 at the age of 86.Martí Vergés passes away ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish footballers
title: Martí Vergés
